  1. For any device service or malfunction related issue, kindly call on 8884880013 / 8884880019.
  2. For renewal or discontinue of the service , kindly call on 8884880013 / 8884880023.
  3. Security deposit and 1st month rental to be paid at the time of delivery and installation.
  4. Rent for every period is due at the beginning of the particular period.
  5. Security deposit (if applicable) will be returned within 3-4 working days after receiving and post inspection of the equipment.
  6. If and physical damage found charges will be applicable as per the actual repair cost.
  7. No rental refund will be there in case of early return.
  8. Equipment should return in the same condition as delivered.
  1. Complete Address : 3rd floor, 240 D, 5th cross, Viveknagar, Bangalore 560047

Note:
I acknowledge that I have received the medical equipment mentioned above in working condition on rental basis for the period mentioned in the document. Post rental period I will return the equipment or pay the renewal amount on or before due date.

  1. Order Received By
    • Name:
    • Address:
  2. Signature
